name: EventPromoCodeInput
description: A promo code that a member can redeem to get a lower ticket price.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: Event ticket price in currency units (e.g. USD) for this promotion.

inputFields.name: dateRange
inputFields.description:
Date range during which this promotion is active.
If omitted, the promotion comes into effect immediately and lasts until the event ends.
Date range cannot be set on promotions for recurring events.

inputFields.name: promoCode
inputFields.description: Promo code that a member needs to submit to activate this promotion.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description:
Maximum number of tickets that can be purchased with this promotion.
If omitted, no limit is applied.
